title: Board of Licensure of Podiatric Medicine - Board Meeting Information
cleaned_text: the public may attend a board meeting in-person, or the public has the option to attend and observe the meeting remotely using the virtual meeting link which will be provided for each meeting below. Please note that individual board members, pursuant to the board's remote participation policy, may be attending the meeting remotely and will not be present at the physical location provided for the meeting. Meetings are open to the public for observation, but not public participation. Please Note: All meetings and meeting agendas are subject to change without notice. We advise you to frequently check this page for meeting updates, changes and cancellations. Individuals may also enter their email address in the "Get Notified" box at the top right-hand corner of the [Board's home page](https://www.maine.gov/pfr/professionallicensing/professions/board-licensure-podiatric-medicine) to subscribe to receive email notifications for the latest Board news, information and updates. (If you are on a mobile device, scroll down to the banner reading "Get Notified" towards the bottom of the page). The Department of Professional and Financial Regulation does not discriminate on the basis of disability in admission to, access to, or operation of its programs, services or activities. Individuals who need auxiliary aid for effective communication in programs and services of the Department are invited to make their needs and preferences known to the Department's ADA Compliance Coordinator. | | 2023 Board Meetings |Date||Agendas||Minutes| |March 9, 2023|| || |[Procedural Rules for the Meeting](https://www.maine.gov/pfr/professionallicensing/sites/maine.gov.pfr.professionallicensing/files/inline-files/procedual_rules_zoom_meeting_5_11_23.pdf) Cancelled - Lack of Quorum | | 2022 Board Meetings |Date||Agendas||Minutes| |March 10, 2022|| | Rules for the Meeting](https://www.maine.gov/pfr/professionallicensing/sites/maine.gov.pfr.professionallicensing/files/inline-files/procedual_rules_zoom_meeting_Template_8_11_22.pdf) [Minutes](https://www.maine.gov/pfr/professionallicensing/sites/maine.gov.pfr.professionallicensing/files/inline-files/August_11_2022_Minutes.pdf) Cancelled Cancelled
